metadata.title: CVE-2020-28019 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Exim 4 before 4.94.2 has Improper Initialization that can lead to recursion-based stack consumption or other consequences. This occurs because use of certain getc functions is mishandled when a client uses BDAT instead of DATA.

notes.note: leosilva> trusty/xenial ESM not affected. vulnerability was introduced by: https://git.exim.org/exim.git/patch/7e3ce68e68ab9b8906a637d352993abf361554e2

criterions.comment: exim4 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.94-15ubuntu1.2').
